bibl.title: Arae. The Curse Poetry of Antiquity.

series.title: ARCA. Classical and Medieval Texts, Papers and Monographs.

bibl.note: Refers to P.G.M. - See in part. pp. 56-62: The Strasbourg Epode [P. Stras. Inv. 3 (= Pack2 1895)] and its Authorship [in favour of Hipponax]; - 63-66: Alcaeus fr. 129 L.-P. - Pp. 223-229: Appendix 3. Hellenistic Curse Poetry: The Texts [including Euphorion, Ἀραί and Θρᾷξ]. - Pp. 260-263: Addendum [brief discussion of P. Brux. II, 22].
bibl.seg: 364 Alcaeus Carmina varia Graeca Euphorion Chalcidensis Hipponax Magica
WATSON Lindsay C., Arae. The Curse Poetry of Antiquity. (ARCA. Classical and Medieval Texts, Papers and Monographs. 26.)
Leeds, Fr. Cairns, 1991, 8°, viii-263 pp. ISBN 0-905205-75-8. £30.

Refers to P.G.M. - See in part. pp. 56-62: The Strasbourg Epode [P. Stras. Inv. 3 (= Pack2 1895)] and its Authorship [in favour of Hipponax]; - 63-66: Alcaeus fr. 129 L.-P. - Pp. 223-229: Appendix 3. Hellenistic Curse Poetry: The Texts [including Euphorion, Ἀραί and Θρᾷξ]. - Pp. 260-263: Addendum [brief discussion of P. Brux. II, 22].
